recipe.name: Chicken with lemon and garlic
recipeInstructions: Sprinkle salt to fillets and fry them on both sides in butter or in oil.
Cut the garlic cloves to half and cut the lemon to big sections. Add lemon juice and mineral water to the pan.
Let simmer for 15 minutes. Then add creme fresh and bring to a boil. Season with honey and black pepper.

recipe.name: Greek vegetable casserole
recipeInstructions: Put the rocket to the oven tray.
Cut the zucchini, paprika and onions to big slices. Put them to the oven tray.
Sprinkle oil to vegetables and season with salt and pepper. Add the rest of the ingredients to the oven tray (salad cheese without water).
Bake in the oven at 225 °C for 20 minutes.

recipe.name: Buns
recipeInstructions: Add salt, honey and yeast to lukewarm milk.
Add oatmeals and then flour. Knead the dough and add butter. Cover with cloth and let rise.
Divide the dough to 18 parts. Shape them to small buns. Let rise under cloth.
